name: Line Puzzle Connect Block
description:
Easy to play game for all ages.

HOW TO PLAY:
* Connect matching colors with colorful lines.
* Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve the puzzle.
* Lines cannot be overlapped.

FEATURES:
* No Internet? No problem at all, Enjoy line puzzle anytime, anywhere!
* Free to play game with very simple rules, yet with challenging to master the levels!
* You can enjoy Line Puzzle: Line Draw Connect at your own pace!
* An Impressive number of puzzles to solve with up to 1,000 quality Levels !
* Sci-fi graphics!
*Less ads, but if you don’t like them, pay single buck and get rid of them.
